entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 12:20 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
